bioghist.p: Friends' Library was located at 142 N. 16th Street, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. The Department of Records for the Yearly Meeting of the Religious Society of Friends of Philadelphia and Vicinity was located at 302 Arch Street.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of correspondence and supporting materials related to records search requests for Quaker genealogical research. The collection includes volumes of extracts from the records of various Monthly Meetings concerning births, deaths, marriages, and relocations of individuals; volumes that summarize records search requests; volumes with clippings from [Friends?] newspapers requesting (and providing) information related to particular record searches; correspondence regarding genealogical research between the library and patrons (often providing more detail on the records search requests listed in the ledgers); and correspondence relating to Barbados Quakers.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
